wikipedia_page.main: Alan Spence (born 7 February 1940), is an English footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League.

response: Alan Spence (born 1947) is a Scottish writer and is Professor in Creative Writing at the University of Aberdeen, where he is also artistic director of the annual WORD Festival. He was born in Glasgow, educated at Allan Glen's SchoolAllan Glen's School Club Newsletter, Sept 2017 there, and much of his work is set in the city.
Alan Spence is a member of the Edinburgh Sri Chinmoy Centre and practises meditation.
